short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to render an iframe in a side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Onuro is an AI chatbot application available across multiple platforms including web, mobile (iOS & Android), IDE extensions (JetBrains and VS Code), and browser extensions (Chrome). It comes packed with all the features you'd expect from a modern AI assistant:

• Clean, easy-to-use interface
• AI with internet search capabilities
• Option to switch between different AI models
• Work with your files and images
• Generate images
• Save your chat history
• Customize your experience
• Share your chats with others

The Onuro Chrome extension adds some unique features to improve your browsing:

• Quick access through a side panel while browsing
• Automatic screenshots of your current tab with each message, giving the AI real-time context of what you're working on
• Beta Feature: "Fully Immersed" mode lets the AI control your browser - clicking, typing, navigating, and scrolling around the current tab

Onuro uses a freemium subscription model. Visit https://www.onuro.ai to learn more about pricing and features.
